column3: Escape has failed.^I should have planned the route more carefully.
Damn, I am sorry, but I have to save my life for the revolution……!
Are you also with the Haskell gang?
No, I've never seen him before. I will follow you to the office to prove my innocence.
Good, follow me.^Lucius Eckhart Haskell, you will be executed summarily as behest.
(Maybe I should have put my security on the first place…….)
A merciless swing of the sword stroke my neck.
